law.catch_line: Warrants to be submitted to Treasurer.
law.text: All warrants issued by the Finance and Administration Cabinet shall be submitted to the Treasurer, showing for each warrant the name of the payee and the amount.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1992b-51.
